verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Hame, hame, hame, hameward I be Hame, hame, hame, in my ain country Where the Birch, an' the Pine, an' the bonny Rowan tree They are all bloomin' fair in my ain country

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Hame, hame, hame, hameward I be Hame, hame, hame, in my ain country Where the wild deer run through the glen I'll ne'er see Where my heart I will remain in my ain country

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Hame, hame, hame, hameward I be Hame, hame, hame, in my ain country Where the glint through the mirk, I tell stay thee It'll shine upon them yet, in my ain country

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Hame, hame, hame, hameward I be Hame, hame, hame, in my ain country Where the Birch, an' the Pine, an' the bonny Rowan tree They are all bloomin' fair in my ain country
